data.text:
Ummm……I don't really get what 
you're trying to say, but I guess……
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Ummm……I don't really get what 
<story>you're trying to say, but I guess……

data.text: You want to 『Participate in the Mock Race』 too?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed: <story>You want to 『Participate in the Mock Race』 too?

data.text: Affirmative. ――That's right.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Affirmative. ――That's right.

data.text:
Neo Universe was expressing interest in participating 
in the mock race. And when she did……
data.processed:
<story>Neo Universe was expressing interest in participating 
<story>in the mock race. And when she did……

data.text:
Who is that girl? An Uma Musume……right? 
But her clothes……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Who is that girl? An Uma Musume……right? 
<story>But her clothes……

data.text:
Right, she's not wearing a jersey and I've never seen her 
before. And something about the impression she gives off……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Right, she's not wearing a jersey and I've never seen her 
<story>before. And something about the impression she gives off……

data.text:
It seemed like people were suspicious of her. 
As far as I could tell, Neo Universe wasn't dangerous……
data.processed:
<story>It seemed like people were suspicious of her. 
<story>As far as I could tell, Neo Universe wasn't dangerous……

data.text:
Just how would her run go? 
Together with a sense of uncertainty, the gate opened.
data.processed:
<story>Just how would her run go? 
<story>Together with a sense of uncertainty, the gate opened.

data.text:
Start……negative. Surrounded on all sides by "Satellites" 
……3 to the fore, 2 parallel, and 2 following.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Start……negative. Surrounded on all sides by "Satellites" 
<story>……3 to the fore, 2 parallel, and 2 following.

data.text:
It seems the current status is 『Obstructed』. 
Falling back is possible……However……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>It seems the current status is 『Obstructed』. 
<story>Falling back is possible……However……

data.text:
For now, it is 『Unnecessary』. 
Maintain momentum, and follow the stream――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>For now, it is 『Unnecessary』. 
<story>Maintain momentum, and follow the stream――

data.text:
Oohh, I guess she's not making a move. It's normal for someone 
to panic and try to take a slightly better position, but……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Oohh, I guess she's not making a move. It's normal for someone 
<story>to panic and try to take a slightly better position, but……

data.text:
She's carrying herself quite calmly during this race isn't she? 
Is she really an Uma Musume that hasn't debuted?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>She's carrying herself quite calmly during this race isn't she? 
<story>Is she really an Uma Musume that hasn't debuted?

data.text:
It was like she was an experienced racer, 
avoiding unnecessary actions. It seemed like 
Neo Universe's intelligence was quite high.
data.processed:
<story>It was like she was an experienced racer, 
<story>avoiding unnecessary actions. It seemed like 
<story>Neo Universe's intelligence was quite high.

data.text: And then――The final straight.
data.processed: <story>And then――The final straight.

data.text:
This is……? "Altair's boundary"…… 
There's no way through……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>This is……? "Altair's boundary"…… 
<story>There's no way through……

data.text:
Whoa now……it's the worst situation possible. 
Being surrounded while rounding the 4th corner.
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Whoa now……it's the worst situation possible. 
<story>Being surrounded while rounding the 4th corner.

data.text:
Right, the front ends up acting like a wall. 
Like this, there's no way she can push forward……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Right, the front ends up acting like a wall. 
<story>Like this, there's no way she can push forward……

data.text:
Neo Universe's path to victory was closed. Like this, 
it was almost certain that things wouldn't end well――
data.processed:
<story>Neo Universe's path to victory was closed. Like this, 
<story>it was almost certain that things wouldn't end well――

data.text:
This incident is――"Known". 
Neo Universe……has seen this before.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>This incident is――"Known". 
<story>Neo Universe……has seen this before.

data.text:
Stars are fluid……like liquid matter, 
they are always "flowing". That's why……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Stars are fluid……like liquid matter, 
<story>they are always "flowing". That's why……

data.text: Huuu……!
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Huuu……!

data.text: Eeeeh, she disappeared!?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed: <story>Eeeeh, she disappeared!?

data.text: Where did she go!?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed: <story>Where did she go!?

data.text:
For just a moment, Neo Universe seemed to disappear. 
And then――
data.processed:
<story>For just a moment, Neo Universe seemed to disappear. 
<story>And then――

data.text: Huuu……!!
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Huuu……!!

data.text: Eeeeh!? She was able to slip through that narrow gap!?
data.name: Race Participant A
data.processed: <story>Eeeeh!? She was able to slip through that narrow gap!?

data.text: No way…… What's with this girl's running……!?
data.name: Race Participant B
data.processed: <story>No way…… What's with this girl's running……!?

data.text:
From a distance, it almost seemed like space had distorted. 
No, maybe she really――
data.processed:
<story>From a distance, it almost seemed like space had distorted. 
<story>No, maybe she really――

data.text:
Hey hey, that girl…… 
Didn't that seem kind of strange just now?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Hey hey, that girl…… 
<story>Didn't that seem kind of strange just now?

data.text:
Right……I don't know how she made it…… 
There's alot I want to ask her afterwards……
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Right……I don't know how she made it…… 
<story>There's alot I want to ask her afterwards……

data.text:
She had completely caught their interest. 
Probably……in the worst sense possible.
data.processed:
<story>She had completely caught their interest. 
<story>Probably……in the worst sense possible.

data.text:
Everyone nearby became restless. 
The amazement was slowly turning in to murmurs of unease.
data.processed:
<story>Everyone nearby became restless. 
<story>The amazement was slowly turning in to murmurs of unease.

data.text:
Huuuu~……Looks like I 『Finished First』 
By a head……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Huuuu~……Looks like I 『Finished First』 
<story>By a head……

data.text:
Using words……I couldn't communicate…… 
But……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Using words……I couldn't communicate…… 
<story>But……

data.text:
"Rendezvous". By running, we can understand…… 
By lining up side by side, we can "Connect" and interface.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"Rendezvous". By running, we can understand…… 
<story>By lining up side by side, we can "Connect" and interface.

data.text: This link, for Neo Universe is……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>This link, for Neo Universe is……

data.text:
Hey, you over there. Got a moment? It was amazing that 
you won but……on that last straight, wasn't that a little weird?
data.name: Race Participant A
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you over there. Got a moment? It was amazing that 
<story>you won but……on that last straight, wasn't that a little weird?

data.text:
Right. It almost……looked like she warped. 
But that can't be. It's not possible……but 
maybe there's something about her shoes……?
data.name: Race Participant B
data.processed:
<story>Right. It almost……looked like she warped. 
<story>But that can't be. It's not possible……but 
<story>maybe there's something about her shoes……?

data.text:
Sorry, but do you mind if we take a look? Even if it's 
just a mock race, if there is anything non-regulation……
data.name: Referee
data.processed:
<story>Sorry, but do you mind if we take a look? Even if it's 
<story>just a mock race, if there is anything non-regulation……

data.text:
There are 『People』 around me……Is this……attraction? 
Neo Universe is drawing in various "Existences"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>There are 『People』 around me……Is this……attraction? 
<story>Neo Universe is drawing in various "Existences"……

data.text: But, this type of link……doesn't seem to be joyous. "ABSS"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>But, this type of link……doesn't seem to be joyous. "ABSS"……

data.text:
Neo Universe was surrounded by quite a lot of people but 
seemed nervous. At this rate, she might be taken away……
data.processed:
<story>Neo Universe was surrounded by quite a lot of people but 
<story>seemed nervous. At this rate, she might be taken away……

data.text:
They would probably investigate several things about her. 
As a result, maybe they would come to understand her. 
It would be fine if that was all, but……
data.processed:
<story>They would probably investigate several things about her. 
<story>As a result, maybe they would come to understand her. 
<story>It would be fine if that was all, but……

data.text:
Maybe the investigation would escalate further. It was possible 
they'd end up asking her things she didn't want to answer……
data.processed:
<story>Maybe the investigation would escalate further. It was possible 
<story>they'd end up asking her things she didn't want to answer……

data.text:
Once again at "Altair's Boundary"…… 
Where should Neo Universe go……?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Once again at "Altair's Boundary"…… 
<story>Where should Neo Universe go……?

data.text: ――? You're………
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――? You're………

data.text:
Aaah, where are you going!? 
Wait! Wait a second!!
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Aaah, where are you going!? 
<story>Wait! Wait a second!!

data.text:
In a panic we left that place. 
For now, I need to take her to a safe place……
data.processed:
<story>In a panic we left that place. 
<story>For now, I need to take her to a safe place……

data.text: Excuse me……why are you assisting me……?
data.name: Neo Universe

choices.text: Because you're not a bad person!
Because you're not a bad person!

data.processed: <story>Excuse me……why are you assisting me……?

data.text:
I had no idea what she was. Since she's harmless, 
then obviously I want to help her. That was it.
data.processed:
<story>I had no idea what she was. Since she's harmless, 
<story>then obviously I want to help her. That was it.

data.text: ――? The Uma Musume that was in the race just now……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>――? The Uma Musume that was in the race just now……

data.text:
Was it……Uni-san……? 
Why is everyone chasing her……?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Was it……Uni-san……? 
<story>Why is everyone chasing her……?
